>
[Secret-Keeper's Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=914)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [GM's Toolkit: Secret Keeper's Mask](/Sources.aspx?ID=67) pg. 0</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each of these full-face masks is made of stitched materials—often including humanoid skin—and has a single, bulbous eye. While wearing the mask, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) and the mask doesn't impair your vision. The mask can also be activated, with an ability based on its type.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Blackfingers)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [GM's Toolkit: Secret Keeper's Mask](/Sources.aspx?ID=67) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This featureless mask is made of thin, papery skin. Its single eye is a fragile bubble of venom-filled glass.

Secret-Keeper's Mask (Gray Master)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [GM's Toolkit: Secret Keeper's Mask](/Sources.aspx?ID=67) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This monochrome mask is made of tattered rags of gray and black cloth and bleached fragments of skin.

<document level="2" id="action-689" />

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs=""
>
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Father Skinsaw)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [GM's Toolkit: Secret Keeper's Mask](/Sources.aspx?ID=67) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This mask is a patchwork of tanned skins, each with a distinctive scar. It is contorted into a caricature of a face with a leering eye.

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

This mask is made of gray and black tiles sewn together. It has a messy, inky spiral over the mouth.
